sentence: Joe Manchin of West Virginia and Kyrsten Sinema and Mark Kelly of Arizona opposed the nomination.
author: Mark Moore
title: Biden pick for Labor post defeated in Senate — with three Dems opposing

sentence: Joe Manchin (D-W.Va.), Kyrsten Sinema (D-Ariz.), and Mark Kelly (D-Ariz.) voted against allowing Dr. David Weil's nomination to move forward Wednesday evening, several months after the former Obama administration official was first nominated for the top wage regulatory role.
author: Julia Conley
title: 'Body Blow to Working People': Right-Wing Democrats Reject Biden Labor Nominee

author: Levi Sumagaysay
title: Senate’s rejection of Biden Labor Department nominee seen as a win for gig companies, loss for PRO Act
